Description:
Job Requirements:Will manage a team of accounting and tax professionals. This will involve reviewing the work before submission to the client. The team size will be between 10-12 team members.
The manager will be expected to understand how the team is deployed and if all team members are adequately assigned clients and tasks.
Communicate with the CEO and keep the CEO posted on all developments.Salary:AED 10K to AED 12KSkills
Skills: The candidate should be a qualified accountant (CA, ACCA, CPA or equivalent)

Must have at least 6-7 years of experience
Preferably the Philippines or Indian. Open to other qualified profiles as well.
The profile requires knowledge in accounting, IFRS, VAT (UAE), Corporate tax and audit procedures. Corporate tax is a new law, so we can understand if the knowledge in the same is still not complete or evolving.
The manager would be expected to liaise with recruitment agencies to hire new talent.
The manager must be able to handle clients that the team is handling, communicate with the client and represent the company, whenever necessary.
The manager must build processes where considered appropriate to create greater efficiencies and better productivity.
